Name: Build Road (FA and KIN)
Parameters: Initial Hexside of road / Final Hexside of road (ne,nw,w,se,sw,e)

Name: Name New Character
Parameters: Name (5-17 letters) / Gender / Comm / Agent / Emiss / Mage skill points.

Name: Hire Army
Parameters: # of Troops / Troop Type / Weapons / Armor / Food

Name: Transfer Command of Army
Parameters: New Commander Character ID / Join Army (y/n)

Name: Abandon Ships
Parameters: Hex Location / # of Warships / # of Transports

Name: Transfer Food: Army to Army
Parameters: Other Commander Char ID /  # of Food units transferred

Name: Xfer War Mchns: Army to Army
Parameters: Other Commander Char ID / # of War Machines transferred

Name: Xfer Weapons: Army to Army
Parameters: Other Commander Char ID / # of each weapon type, each on a diff. line.

Name: Xfer Armor: Army to Army
Parameters: Other Commander Char ID / # of each armor type, each on a different line.

Name: Xfer Troops: Army to Army
Parameters: Other Commander Char ID / # of each troop type, each on a different line.

Name: Xfer Ships: Navy to Navy
Parameters: Other Commander Char ID / # of Warships / # of Transports transferred.

Name: Upgrade Troop Weapons
Parameters: New Weapon type / # of each Troop type upgraded, each on a different line.

Name: Upgrade Troop Armor
Parameters: New Armor type / # of each Troop type upgraded, each on a different line.

Name: Retire Troops
Parameters: # of each Troop type retired, each on a different line.

Name: Split Army
Parameters: New Commander ID / # of each Troop Type, each on a different line.

Name: Scout Army
Parameters: Army Commander Character ID / Follow army? (y/n)

Name: Demand Ransom for Hostage
Parameters: Hostage Character ID / Amount of GOLD desired for ransom

Name: Offer Ransom for Hostage
Parameters: Hostage Character ID / Amount of GOLD offered / Release? (y/n)

Name: Bribe/Recruit Character
Parameters: Target Character ID / Amount of GOLD for bribe (>=500)

Name: Cast Movement Spell
Parameters: Spell ID # / Destination Hex # (See spell for ranges)

Name: Forget Spell(s)
Parameters: 1-6 Spell IDs to be forgotten (1 per line)

Name: Bid from Caravans
Parameters: Product / # of units to purchase / Amount bid (price per unit, not total)

Name: Nation Sell to Caravans
Parameters: Product / % of product to be sold (1-100)

Name: Transfer: Artifacts to Character
Parameters: Other Character ID / 1-6 Artifact IDs (1 per line)

Name: Transfer: Hostages to Character
Parameters: Other Character ID / 1-3 Hostage Character IDs (1 per line)

Name: Join Army
Parameters: Army Commander Character ID  to be joined

Name: Pickup Artifact
Parameters: 1-6 Artifact IDs to be picked up

Name: Transport by Caravan
Parameters: Origin Hex / Destination Hex / Product / # of units transported

Name: Move Navy
Parameters: Directions for each hex sailed (1 per cell) / Travel mode (no,ev)

Name: Move Army
Parameters: Directions for each hex moved (1 per cell) / Travel mode (no,ev)

Name: Force March Army
Parameters: Directions for each hex moved (1 per cell) / Travel mode (no,ev)

Name: Move Character & Join Army
Parameters: Destination Hex (within 12 hexes) / Army Commander Character ID
